snippet.title: Panoptia - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2604880/Panoptia/
Add on Itch: https://enricosut.itch.io/panoptia

Panoptia is a narrative-driven atmospheric exploration game about a strange building called Panoptia that has mysteriously appeared in town. No one knows what secrets hides in its depths. Uncover these secrets if you hope to ever escape...

For more information, go to: 
Website: https://EnricosUt.carrd.co
TikTok: https://tiktok.com/@EnricosUt
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EnricosUt

Promotional artwork done by @micro.officiaI2024
